articles.title: Living with paranoid schizophrenia - Deccan Herald
articles.description: As tears rolled down my face, my husband asked, “Should I love you like a poodle?” I hoped he would urge me to stay and reassure me that everything was fine and that he loved me and our five-year-old daughter. I was being sent to my mother’s house without my …
